To be fair to Emma, she concedes later on that Finns have plenty of technology at their disposal (Smartboards, mobile devices, laptop computers — they’re even developing an educational cloud-based service in collaboration with Estonia) and that they are actually making good, discerning use of it. And this is perhaps where her criticism ought to have been focused.
